amendment.description: To increase funding for certain education and related programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1603 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1603 proposed by Senator Reid to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11239; text: CR S11239) To increase funding for certain education and related programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1603 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1603 proposed by Senator Reid to Amendment SA 1542.
